title: Not As It Seems
description:
Seaton Smith, Rojo Perez and Geraldine Buckley share stories about first and second impressions.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Rumble Strips, Seaton Smith, Jeff Barr, Wale, Kevin Allison, Geraldine Buckley, Oscar Peterson Trio & Clark Terry, Rojo Perez, Daniel Merriweather)
